title: Xamarin/SkiaSharp HotReload issue from 5.0.0.2012
body:
Hi all, i ve SkiaPulse on my Xamarin prj with 4.7 version.

I tried to update to 5.0.0.2012 Xamarin version, and if i ve enabled hotreload when i render page with skiapulse element all app go slow and has trotthling issues.
If i disable hot reload all go well.

Anyone knows something about that?

Thanks a lot
